backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko actor with no methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping two UI interaction features to frontend/src/App.tsx with component and test metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of multiple frontend files describing styling, layout, animations, and evasive button behavior.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base theme variables for light/dark modes and global styling tokens.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app controlling view states and evasive No button logic with burst and heart animations.
frontend/src/components/CelebrationHeart: Generates continuous floating heart animations across the screen.
frontend/src/components/HeartBurst.tsx: Creates an 8‑heart radial burst animation at a given click position.
Provides a centered card-style layout wrapper with themed styling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook creating and managing a backend actor tied to Internet Identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an auth context using Internet Identity with login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind theme variables plus heart, burst, fade, and evasive‑button animations for the app.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with typography, container queries, animations, custom colors, fonts, shadows, and plugins.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata outlining architecture, assets, interaction notes, existing features, issues, and generated images.
